description:
This plugin allows users to sign in through an SSO provider (such as Google, Facebook, or your own provider). This enables one-click signin.
Review documentation at https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso
name: SSO Authentication
overview: Authenticate users against an SSO provider.

versions.changelog:
More CI fixes

## What's Changed
* fix: consistently use OpenID instead of OID on the config page by @CFenner in https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/pull/193
* Support DisableHttps/DoNotValidateIssuerName in SSOController.OidChallenge by @andreblanke in https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/pull/239
* Allow to disable pushed authorization by @bdovaz in https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/pull/244
* Update oddstr13/jellyfin-plugin-repository-manager by @bdovaz in https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/pull/247
* Avatar via OIDC Provider by @Estyms in https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/pull/202
* Allow port override by @bdovaz in https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/pull/246
* Fix artifact names by @bdovaz in https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/pull/248
* Prevent force updating username by @FeikoJoosten in https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/pull/251
* remove deprecated redirect uri from readme by @hendrik1120 in https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/pull/280
* Match the styling of the redirection page with Jellyfin colors and font by @kernelb00t in https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/pull/269
* Use punycode URL for redirect page - OIDC by @babbitt in https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/pull/265

# Self Service: 

* Users can link existing jellyfin accounts to SSO provider accounts
* Users can remove existing links
* Users can configure multiple SSO provider accounts
* Account names no longer have to match across Jellyfin -> SSO provider
  * Eg, can link google OIDC, with a `sub` of `asfbeausfahgajsfjasd-ugly-sub` to jellyfin username `matthew`

## What's Changed

### Features

* Implement Canonical Linking + Self Service by @matthewstrasiotto in https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/pull/34
   * Account names no longer have to match to be linked

### Fixes

* Fix ID Provider incorrectly resetting on login by @matthewstrasiotto in https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/pull/33

### Documentation

* Document Provider Specific Configuration, Small Readme Update by @matthewstrasiotto in https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/pull/31
* docs: move build-from-source to contributing section, link vscode config by @matthewstrasiotto in https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/pull/63
* docs: :memo: document new plugin install mechanism by @matthewstrasiotto in https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/pull/56

### CI / Build

* Add github action for publishing releases by @matthewstrasiotto in https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/pull/39
* Revert "Add github action for publishing releases" by @9p4 in https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/pull/40
* Revert "Revert "Add github action for publishing releases"" by @matthewstrasiotto in https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/pull/46
* pin version of oddstr13/jprm to specific commit by @matthewstrasiotto in https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/pull/48
* ci: pin kevinjil/jprm-action to specific sha by @matthewstrasiotto in https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/pull/50
* ci: ignore prereleases when publishing manifest by @matthewstrasiotto in https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/pull/52
* ci: add checksum to nightly builds by @matthewstrasiotto in https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/pull/53
* ci: only run checksum agaisnt zip files by @matthewstrasiotto in https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/pull/54
* build: ignore .vscode entirely in gitignore by @matthewstrasiotto in https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/pull/62

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/compare/v3.3.0.0...v3.4.0.2

## What's Changed

* CI: Prettier Workflow: Remove explicit branch ref from checkout by @matthewstrasiotto in https://github.com/9p4/jellyfin-plugin-sso/pull/25
